column3: Oh! Hello there. Welcome to the Lightfeather Proving Grounds.
What kind of place is this?
Officially, I'm supposed to show people around and answer their questions, but in practice, that's hardly necessary, as we rarely see new faces around here.
Not that I mind. I rather like being free to watch the fights.
As you might expect from the name, the Lightfeather Proving Grounds were originally established to host matches for battle-trained chocobos.
That being said, House Dzemael has since allowed the grounds to be used for other purposes on occasion.
Some other houses have staged spectacles, for both private and public amusement. The Temple Knights have also held exhibitions in the past as well─those are always a delight, believe you me.
